attributes.action: support the aims of the group Taintedblood by calling for a full and independent public inquiry into NHS blood contaminated with HIV and Hepatitis C, resulting in hundreds of avoidable deaths and untold suffering at the hands of NHS and government. Also to properly compensate those people who fell victim to this medical disaster, both living with these infections and those bereaved from such persons, so as to bring some level of security and normality back into their lives.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details: Telling people how to find other websites is deemed the same as linking to them.
